patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,28 +1,110 @@
-<!-- public/icons/especificacoes.svg -->
-<svg id="svg-especificacoes"
-     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
-     viewBox="0 0 600 350"
-     role="img" aria-label="Especificações do produto">
-  <title>Especificações do produto</title>
-  <desc>Quadro com título "Especificações" e espaço para até 5 linhas.</desc>
+<!-- public/icons/especificacoes-pet.svg -->
+<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 800 520" role="img" aria-label="Quadro de Especificações - tema pet"
+     style="--_primary: var(--color-primary); --_secondary: var(--color-secondary); --_accent: var(--color-accent); --_light: var(--color-light); --_dark: var(--color-dark);">
+  <title>Especificações</title>
+  <desc>Quadro vazio, com faixa de título, moldura com ossinhos e patinhas superiores refinadas.</desc>
 
-  <!-- Moldura -->
-  <rect x="20" y="60" width="560" height="270" rx="20" ry="20"
-        fill="var(--color-light)" stroke="var(--color-secondary)" stroke-width="6"/>
+  <!-- Marca d’água coração (usa a cor primária, bem suave) -->
+  <path d="M400,120 C360,70 280,80 280,150 C280,205 330,240 400,300 C470,240 520,205 520,150 C520,80 440,70 400,120 Z"
+        fill="var(--_primary)" opacity="0.16"/>
 
-  <!-- Faixa do título -->
-  <rect x="180" y="20" width="240" height="50" rx="15" ry="15"
-        fill="var(--color-primary)" stroke="var(--color-dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
-  <text x="300" y="53" text-anchor="middle"
-        font-size="22" font-weight="700" font-family="Arial, sans-serif"
-        fill="white" stroke="var(--color-dark)" stroke-width="0.5">
-    Especificações
-  </text>
+  <!-- Moldura principal -->
+  <rect x="28" y="72" width="744" height="410" rx="26"
+        fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="6"/>
 
-  <!-- Linhas dinâmicas (mantém os mesmos IDs usados no JS) -->
-  <text id="svg-spec-idade"         x="50" y="110" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
-  <text id="svg-spec-pet"           x="50" y="150" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
-  <text id="svg-spec-porte"         x="50" y="190" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
-  <text id="svg-spec-apresentacao"  x="50" y="230" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
-  <text id="svg-spec-ean"           x="50" y="270" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
+  <!-- Ossinhos (cantos) -->
+  <!-- topo-esquerdo -->
+  <g transform="translate(60,104) rotate(-25)">
+    <rect x="-30" y="-7" width="60" height="14" rx="7" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="-35" cy="0" r="9"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="-42" cy="0" r="6"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="35"  cy="0" r="9"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="42"  cy="0" r="6"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+  </g>
+  <!-- topo-direito -->
+  <g transform="translate(740,104) rotate(205)">
+    <rect x="-30" y="-7" width="60" height="14" rx="7" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="-35" cy="0" r="9"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="-42" cy="0" r="6"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="35"  cy="0" r="9"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="42"  cy="0" r="6"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+  </g>
+  <!-- base-esquerdo -->
+  <g transform="translate(60,464) rotate(25)">
+    <rect x="-30" y="-7" width="60" height="14" rx="7" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="-35" cy="0" r="9"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="-42" cy="0" r="6"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="35"  cy="0" r="9"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="42"  cy="0" r="6"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+  </g>
+  <!-- base-direito -->
+  <g transform="translate(740,464) rotate(-205)">
+    <rect x="-30" y="-7" width="60" height="14" rx="7" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="-35" cy="0" r="9"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="-42" cy="0" r="6"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="35"  cy="0" r="9"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+    <circle cx="42"  cy="0" r="6"  fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
+  </g>
+
+  <!-- Faixa do título (usa a cor de destaque do tema) -->
+  <rect x="230" y="22" width="340" height="72" rx="24"
+        fill="var(--_accent)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="4"/>
+  <text x="400" y="67" text-anchor="middle"
+        font-family="Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif"
+        font-size="28" font-weight="700" fill="#ffffff">Especificações</text>
+
+  <!-- Patinhas decorativas de cima -->
+  <g transform="translate(208,60) rotate(-10)">
+    <ellipse cx="0" cy="12" rx="18" ry="14" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+    <ellipse cx="-4" cy="6" rx="9" ry="6" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.25"/>
+    <ellipse cx="-14" cy="-4" rx="6.5" ry="7.5" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+    <ellipse cx="14"  cy="-4" rx="6.5" ry="7.5" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+    <ellipse cx="-6"  cy="-16" rx="5.5" ry="6.5" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+    <ellipse cx="6"   cy="-16" rx="5.5" ry="6.5" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+  </g>
+
+  <g transform="translate(592,60) rotate(10)">
+    <ellipse cx="0" cy="12" rx="18" ry="14" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+    <ellipse cx="-4" cy="6" rx="9" ry="6" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.25"/>
+    <ellipse cx="-14" cy="-4" rx="6.5" ry="7.5" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+    <ellipse cx="14"  cy="-4" rx="6.5" ry="7.5" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+    <ellipse cx="-6"  cy="-16" rx="5.5" ry="6.5" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+    <ellipse cx="6"   cy="-16" rx="5.5" ry="6.5" fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+  </g>
+
+  <!-- Área de conteúdo -->
+  <rect x="56" y="112" width="688" height="340" rx="18"
+        fill="var(--_light)" stroke="var(--_dark)" stroke-width="2"/>
+
+  <!-- Marcas d’água -->
+  <g opacity="0.10" fill="var(--_dark)">
+    <g transform="translate(96,148)">
+      <circle cx="0" cy="6" r="12"/>
+      <circle cx="-13" cy="-6" r="6"/>
+      <circle cx="13" cy="-6" r="6"/>
+      <circle cx="-6" cy="-15" r="5"/>
+      <circle cx="6" cy="-15" r="5"/>
+    </g>
+    <g transform="translate(704,148) scale(-1,1)">
+      <circle cx="0" cy="6" r="12"/>
+      <circle cx="-13" cy="-6" r="6"/>
+      <circle cx="13" cy="-6" r="6"/>
+      <circle cx="-6" cy="-15" r="5"/>
+      <circle cx="6" cy="-15" r="5"/>
+    </g>
+    <g transform="translate(96,432)">
+      <circle cx="0" cy="6" r="12"/>
+      <circle cx="-13" cy="-6" r="6"/>
+      <circle cx="13" cy="-6" r="6"/>
+      <circle cx="-6" cy="-15" r="5"/>
+      <circle cx="6" cy="-15" r="5"/>
+    </g>
+    <g transform="translate(704,432) scale(-1,1)">
+      <circle cx="0" cy="6" r="12"/>
+      <circle cx="-13" cy="-6" r="6"/>
+      <circle cx="13" cy="-6" r="6"/>
+      <circle cx="-6" cy="-15" r="5"/>
+      <circle cx="6" cy="-15" r="5"/>
+    </g>
+  </g>
 </svg>

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<!-- public/icons/especificacoes.svg -->
<svg id="svg-especificacoes"
     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
     viewBox="0 0 600 350"
     role="img" aria-label="Especificações do produto">
  <title>Especificações do produto</title>
  <desc>Quadro com título "Especificações" e espaço para até 5 linhas.</desc>

  <!-- Moldura -->
  <rect x="20" y="60" width="560" height="270" rx="20" ry="20"
        fill="var(--color-light)" stroke="var(--color-secondary)" stroke-width="6"/>

  <!-- Faixa do título -->
  <rect x="180" y="20" width="240" height="50" rx="15" ry="15"
        fill="var(--color-primary)" stroke="var(--color-dark)" stroke-width="3"/>
  <text x="300" y="53" text-anchor="middle"
        font-size="22" font-weight="700" font-family="Arial, sans-serif"
        fill="white" stroke="var(--color-dark)" stroke-width="0.5">
    Especificações
  </text>

  <!-- Linhas dinâmicas (mantém os mesmos IDs usados no JS) -->
  <text id="svg-spec-idade"         x="50" y="110" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
  <text id="svg-spec-pet"           x="50" y="150" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
  <text id="svg-spec-porte"         x="50" y="190" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
  <text id="svg-spec-apresentacao"  x="50" y="230" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
  <text id="svg-spec-ean"           x="50" y="270" font-size="16" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" fill="var(--color-dark)"></text>
</svg>
